 1997-12421997-08-280,  ,  ,  FAIT, 
PrecisAuthority for the Minister of Foreign Affairs (a) to sign the INTERNATIONAL CONVENTION ON LIABILITY AND COMPENSATION FOR DAMAGE IN CONNECTION WITH THE CARRIAGE OF HAZARDOUS AND NOXIOUS SUBSTANCES BY SEA, 1996, or (b) to issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing either the Hon. David M. Collenette or the Hon. Roy MacLaren to sign the said Convention.
